title: Precision Component Analyzer
subtitle: 2 models: 6430B (20 Hz to 500 kHz) and 6440B (20 Hz to 3 MHz)

paragraphs: The 6400B Precision Component Analyzer stands out for its comprehensive and accurate testing of passive components up to 3 MHz. It's particularly tailored for capacitor manufacturers, offering fast automatic production testing and complete design characterization. With a focus on high performance at an unbeatable price, the 6400B achieves a basic accuracy of 0.02%, making it a valuable tool for passive component designers, manufacturing tests, materials design and testing, as well as circuit designers evaluating component characteristics.

applications: Capacitor manufacturers for fast automatic production testing
Designers of passive components seeking detailed characterization
Circuit designers evaluating component characteristics at frequencies up to 3 MHz

features.title: High Precision Testing
features.description: Achieves a basic measurement accuracy of 0.02%, ensuring thorough and accurate component evaluation

features.title: Fast Automatic Testing
features.description: Designed for rapid production testing, capable of performing up to eight different tests on each component with multi-frequency mode for performance evaluation over a specified frequency range

features.title: Comprehensive Measurement Functions
features.description: Includes a graphical sweep across all measurement functions, offering detailed analysis capabilities

features.title: Large LCD Display
features.description: Features a large, easy-to-read LCD display, enhancing the user interface for simplified operation

features.title: Protection Against Charged Capacitors
features.description: Incorporates an Overload Protection Unit (1J1100) to safeguard against charged capacitors, ensuring durability and reliability

features.title: Resonant Frequency Calculation
features.description: Automatically calculates the resonant frequency of components, along with their equivalent series or parallel circuit values at that frequency

specifications.heading: Measurement Functions
content: Series or Parallel Equivalent Circuit C+R, C+D, C+Q, L+R, L+Q
Series equivalent circuit only X+R, X+D, X+Q
Parallel equivalent circuit only C+G, B+G, B+D, B+Q
Polar Form Z + Phase Angle, Y + Phase Angle

modelVariants.spec: 20 Hz to 500 kHz > 1000 steps (> 1500 steps with analysis option fitted)

specifications.heading: Drive Level (Rdc)
content: 100 mV or 1 V with 100 Ω source resistance

specifications.heading: Internal DC Bias Supply
content: 2 V with rapid charge capacitor bias

specifications.heading: DC Bias Voltage (External)
content: External supply of up to ±60 V may be connected via rear panel

specifications.heading: Measurement Speeds
content: Up to 20 measurements per second for test frequencies ≥100 Hz

specifications.heading: Accuracy
specifications.note: Accuracy varies with component range measurement speed and frequency

specifications.heading: Input Specification
content: Power supply 230 V AC ±10% or 115 V AC ±10% (selectable)

specifications.heading: Display
content: Monochrome LCD, 320x240 resolution, CFL backlight, high contrast

specifications.heading: Measurement Connections
content: 4-wire (Kelvin) measurements with screen at ground potential
